sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are in a restaurant, when they overheard Tomoya Kusano talking about his kindness to his friend Hajime Yamanashi. Conan notice an angry suspicious man in hoodie. Later, Tomoya Kusano is found dead in the toilet.

The police investigate the scene and the man in hoodie, Shin Kotani, seems worried. Is he the culprit?

sections.Resolution:
She was able to run to a police box, but there was no one there since the police officer was with Tomoya, who called them only because he saw a suspicious man outside his house. In the end, Akiho was also murdered, and Hajime, after hearing Tomoya's story and learning that he was responsible, decided to get revenge, so he killed Tomoya. It is revealed that Shin Kotani also wanted to murder Tomoya with the same method that Hajime used because he had caused him to be fired from his job, but he refused to do it and decided to stay calm in the restaurant.

sections.Trivia:
- The first director responsible for the Detective Conan anime and movies, Kenji Kodama, under the pseudonym Chonin Kamikawa, did the storyboard for this episode.
- The police cars from Mystery of the Burning Tent and The Kendo Tournament of Love and Mystery reappeared.
- The hand dryer is a Dyson Airblade.
